-Dollywood

title: Favorite Amusment Park(s)?

replies.body:
- Disney World (All 6 of them but Epcot was the best one).
- Sea World (Really exciting shows and aquariums).
- Universal Studios (Island of Adventure had some damn good games).
- Bush Gardens (Best rollercoasters you'll ever find).

Yeah, I've went to the US over 5 times already, xd.
replies.body_tagged:
- Disney World (All 6 of them but Epcot was the best one).

replies.body: The only 2 big ones I've been to are Thorpe Park, which is one of the biggest in Europe, and it was incredible, and I went to Disneyland Florida when I was about 6, and I remember not really liking it.
replies.body_tagged: The only 2 big ones I've been to are Thorpe Park, which is one of the biggest in Europe, and it was incredible, and I went to Disneyland Florida when I was about 6, and I remember not really liking it.

replies.body: Six Flags is like the only one I've been to.
replies.body_tagged: Six Flags is like the only one I've been to.

Too soon?
